description.value:
The dragon either temporarily appears to be in multiple places at once or grows to Gargantuan size to frighten their foes. Each enemy within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:120] who can see the mirage dragon must attempt a @Check[will|dc:0|options:area-effect,inflicts:frightened] save (with a DC equal to the dragon's Captivating Display).

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} and can't is use reactions until the start of the dragon's next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 3}.
